intent_atoms.description: Export parse issue metrics in JSONParseTreeExporter so downstream clients can surface severity counts and deepest affected depth
Update CLI compatibility coverage to assert new metrics alongside refreshed Bento4-derived fixtures
JSON export snapshots must be regenerated across representative fixtures to capture the issue metrics field
Snapshots should reflect current schema changes when ISOINSPECTOR_REGENERATE_SNAPSHOTS=1 is set

functional_units.name: JSONParseTreeExporter
functional_units.description: Exports parse issue metrics as JSON payloads exposing severity counts and deepest affected depth for downstream clients

functional_units.name: CLI Compatibility Coverage Test
functional_units.description: Asserts new metrics alongside refreshed Bento4-derived fixtures to ensure CLI compatibility

functional_units.name: JSON Export Snapshot Regeneration
functional_units.description: Regenerates JSON export snapshots across representative fixtures to capture the issue metrics field
